description:
Technical trails and demanding approaches, shifting terrain and mixed conditions – the Konseal FL 2 GTX frees you to move with confidence, agility and comfort. Inspired by running shoes, then bolstered with added support and protection, it combines waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex protection, a Vibram® Megagrip outsole for a secure grip – wet or dry – and a TPU chassis and raised perimeter sidewalls for added stability. The fit is precise, and its minimalist design is distinctly Arc’teryx.

Updates include a redesigned upper for improved breathability and flex, a lug pattern for better balancing, smearing and traction, and a lighter weight, non-absorbent insole.
name: Arcteryx Konseal FL 2 GTX - Mens
